    function formatSpaces(str) {

    var match = str.match(/(\\\\)/);
console.log(match);
if (match == null) { // Did it match?
    return str;
} else {
    var prefix = '\\begin{matrix}';
    var suffix =  '\\end{matrix}';
    return prefix + str + suffix;
}
